description: Retrieves multiple schemas by their identifiers.

parameters.name: collaborationIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the collaboration that the schemas belong to. Currently accepts collaboration ID.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: The names for the schema objects to retrieve. (string) ---

nested_items.name: schemas
nested_items.description: The retrieved list of schemas.

nested_items.name: columns
nested_items.description: The columns for the relation that this schema represents.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the column.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the column.

nested_items.name: partitionKeys
nested_items.description: The partition keys for the dataset underlying this schema.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the column.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the column.

nested_items.name: analysisRuleTypes
nested_items.description: The analysis rule types that are associated with the schema. Currently, only one entry is present.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: analysisMethod
nested_items.description: The analysis method for the schema.

nested_items.name: selectedAnalysisMethods
nested_items.description: The selected analysis methods for the schema.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: creatorAccountId
nested_items.description: The unique account ID for the Amazon Web Services account that owns the schema.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A name for the schema. The schema relation is referred to by this name when queried by a protected query.

nested_items.name: collaborationId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the collaboration that the schema belongs to.

nested_items.name: collaborationArn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the collaboration that the schema belongs to.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description for the schema.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the schema was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time at which the schema was updated.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of schema.

nested_items.name: schemaStatusDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the status of the schema. Currently, only one entry is present.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the schema, indicating if it is ready to query.

nested_items.name: reasons
nested_items.description: The reasons why the schema status is set to its current state.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The schema status reason code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: An explanation of the schema status reason code.

nested_items.name: analysisRuleType
nested_items.description: The analysis rule type for which the schema status has been evaluated.

nested_items.name: configurations
nested_items.description: The configuration details of the schema analysis rule for the given type.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: analysisType
nested_items.description: The type of analysis that can be performed on the schema.

nested_items.name: schemaTypeProperties
nested_items.description: The schema type properties.

nested_items.name: idMappingTable
nested_items.description: The ID mapping table for the schema type properties.

nested_items.name: idMappingTableInputSource
nested_items.description: Defines which ID namespace associations are used to create the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: idNamespaceAssociationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the ID namespace association.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the input source of the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: Error reasons for schemas that could not be retrieved. One error is returned for every schema that could not be retrieved.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: An error name for the error.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: An error code for the error.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: An error message for the error.
